body.p: Happy New Year!
2011’s first silisec meetup will be around 7pm on Thursday January 6th at the Faultline Brewing Company in Sunnyvale. (Facebook)
Time for another silisec meetup! See you around 7pm on Thursday December 2nd at the Faultline Brewing Company in Sunnyvale. (Facebook)
Word on the vine is that the next silisec meetup is around 7pm on Thursday September 2nd at the Faultline Brewing Company in Sunnyvale. (Facebook)
Is everyone back from Black Hat/DEFCON? OK! Let’s do this. The next silisec meetup is around 7pm on Thursday August 12th at the Faultline Brewing Company in Sunnyvale. (Facebook)

Happy Independence Day! For those of you that survive the weekend’s grilling and pyrotechnics unscathed, the next silisec meetup is around 7pm on Thursday July 8th at the Faultline Brewing Company in Sunnyvale. (Facebook)
The next silisec meetup is around 7pm on Thursday June 3rd at the Faultline Brewing Company in Sunnyvale. (Facebook)
The next silisec meetup is around 7pm on Thursday April 7th at the Faultline Brewing Company in Sunnyvale.
Refresh your Saint Paddy’s Day hangovers with your favorite security crew at this month’s silisec. Meetup around 7pm on Thursday March 18th at the Faultline Brewing Company in Sunnyvale.
silisec wants to be your Valentine! Rendezvous for this month’s meetup around 7pm on Thursday February 11th at St. John’s Grill.
Happy New Year!
2010’s first silisec meetup will be around 7pm on Thursday January 7th at St. John’s Grill. See you there!
Happy Thanksgiving!
You barely have time to eat all the leftovers before the next silisec. See you at St. John’s Grill around 7pm on Thursday December 3rd.
silisec is returning to Sunnyvale, this time at St. John’s Grill. Meet us there around 7pm on Thursday November 5th!
silisec is returning to Mountain View, this time at St. Stephens Green. Meet us there around 7pm on Thursday October 8th!
St. Stephens Green is a five minute walk from the Caltrain station.
After a brief hiatus for Black Hat / DEFCON, it’s silisec time again!
This month we’ll meet up at Pedro’s Restaurant & Cantina near Great America, off the 101. Looking forward to seeing you Tuesday September 1st, starting around 7pm!
Hey, Happy Independence Day, Everyone!

This week brings a new silisec meetup in Mountain View, at Tied House Café and Brewery, a few blocks west from the Caltrain station. Look for your secpals sliding into inebriation Thursday July 9th, starting around 7pm!

Of course silisec is not the only Citysec meetup in the San Francisco Bay Area, nor even the first. In fact, silisec got its start through folks who just couldn’t get enough of Baysec. Check out the next Baysec meetup at Kate O’Briens in downtown San Francisco!
The next silisec meetup is June 3rd starting 6:30pm at St John’s Bar & Grill in Sunnyvale. See you there!
The next silisec meetup is May 6 starting 6:30pm at The Duke in Cupertino. See you there!
We are happy to announce silisec, a CitySec meetup for Silicon Valley! Catch up with friends and colleagues, meet new folks, talk security shop, swap ideas, and drink beer.
Don’t forget to also check out BaySec in the City.
